title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9600.4 - Revocation of prequalification status
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9600.4 - Revocation of prequalification status

State Regulations
(a) The authority may revoke the prequalified
status of a contractor on the basis of either changed circumstances or
discovery of new evidence that indicates the firm does not meet the authority's
standards. Following such revocation, the authority shall determine the
appropriate period of disqualification in accordance with the standards
enumerated in section
9600.3
of this Part. If it is
determined that the contractor knowingly and willfully submitted a false
instrument for the purpose of defrauding the authority or of obstructing an
official investigation, the authority may revoke the contractor's
prequalification status permanently. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9600.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
